mapper.select: /* system.cust_mng.getListAll */ select B.CUST_NM as CUST_NM ,SUBSTRING(B.RRNO,1,6) as RRNO ,B.CUST_MBL_TELNO as CUST_MBL_TELNO ,D.PIC_NM as PIC_NM ,(SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CODEMST WHERE CODE_CL = '133' AND CODE_NO = A.CUST_EVT_TY_CD) as CUST_EVT_TY_CD_NM ,A.AVDAY_YMD as AVDAY_YMD from TB_CUSTEVENT A ,TB_CUSTMST B ,TB_CUSTPICREL C ,TB_PICMST D WHERE 1=1 and A.CUST_MBL_TELNO = B.CUST_MBL_TELNO and B.CUST_MBL_TELNO = C.CUST_MBL_TELNO and C.PIC_MBL_TELNO = D.PIC_MBL_TELNO and B.CURR_STCD = '0' and C.CURR_STCD = '0' and D.CURR_STCD = '0'

/* system.cust_mng.getInfo */ SELECT A.CUST_NM as CUST_NM ,A.RRNO as RRNO ,A.CUST_MBL_TELNO as CUST_MBL_TELNO ,A.CO_TELNO as CO_TELNO ,A.CUST_EML_ADDR as CUST_EML_ADDR ,A.OCCP_TY_CD as OCCP_TY_CD ,A.OCCP_TY_CD_NM as OCCP_TY_CD_NM ,A.CUST_ADDR as CUST_ADDR ,A.WRT_DT as WRT_DT FROM ( SELECT A.CUST_NM as CUST_NM ,A.RRNO as RRNO ,A.CUST_MBL_TELNO as CUST_MBL_TELNO ,A.CO_TELNO as CO_TELNO ,A.CUST_EML_ADDR as CUST_EML_ADDR ,A.OCCP_TY_CD as OCCP_TY_CD ,A.OCCP_TY_CD_NM as OCCP_TY_CD_NM ,A.CUST_ADDR as CUST_ADDR ,TO_CHAR(A.WRT_DT, 'YYYYDDMM') as WRT_DT FROM TB_CUSTMST A WHERE 1=1 AND A.CUST_MBL_TELNO = #{cust_mbl_telno} ) A
SELECT csul_id , csul_dtl , TO_CHAR(csul_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS csul_dt FROM TB_CSUL WHERE CUST_MBL_TELNO = #{cust_mbl_telno} ORDER BY csul_dt ASC

/* system.cust_mng.getCustInfoList */ SELECT A.CUST_NM AS CUST_NM, SUBSTRING(A.RRNO, 1, 6) AS RRNO, A.CUST_MBL_TELNO AS CUST_MBL_TELNO, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CODEMST WHERE CODE_CL = '140' AND CODE_NO = A.OCCP_TY_CD) AS OCCP_TY_CD_NM, A.CUST_ADDR AS CUST_ADDR FROM TB_CUSTMST A LEFT JOIN TB_CUSTPICREL B ON A.CUST_MBL_TELNO = B.CUST_MBL_TELNO LEFT JOIN TB_PICMST C ON B.PIC_MBL_TELNO = C.PIC_MBL_TELNO WHERE A.CURR_STCD = '0' AND (B.CURR_STCD = '0' OR B.CURR_STCD IS NULL) AND (C.CURR_STCD = '0' OR C.CURR_STCD IS NULL)
AND C.PIC_NM LIKE CONCAT(#{pic_nm}, '%')
AND C.DEPT_NM LIKE CONCAT(#{dept_nm}, '%')
AND A.CUST_NM LIKE CONCAT(#{cust_nm}, '%')
AND SUBSTRING(A.RRNO, 1, LENGTH(#{rrno})) LIKE CONCAT(#{rrno}, '%')
ORDER BY A.CUST_NM ASC

/* system.cust_mng.getListAll */ select A.CUST_NM as CUST_NM ,SUBSTRING(A.RRNO,1,6) as RRNO ,A.CUST_MBL_TELNO as CUST_MBL_TELNO ,(SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CODEMST WHERE CODE_CL = '140' AND CODE_NO = A.OCCP_TY_CD) as OCCP_TY_CD_NM ,A.CUST_ADDR as CUST_ADDR from TB_CUSTMST A WHERE 1=1 and A.CURR_STCD = '0'

/* system.cust_mng.getCustCardInfo */ SELECT A.CUST_NM AS CUST_NM, A.RRNO AS RRNO, A.CUST_MBL_TELNO AS CUST_MBL_TELNO, A.CO_TELNO AS CO_TELNO, -- 확인 대상 필드 A.CUST_EML_ADDR AS CUST_EML_ADDR, A.OCCP_TY_CD_NM AS OCCP_TY_CD_NM, A.CUST_ADDR AS CUST_ADDR, A.PIC_NM AS PIC_NM, A.DEPT_NM AS DEPT_NM, A.JBPS_TY_CD_NM AS JBPS_TY_CD_NM, A.PIC_MBL_TELNO AS PIC_MBL_TELNO, A.TSK_DTL_CN AS TSK_DTL_CN FROM ( SELECT A.CUST_NM AS CUST_NM, A.RRNO AS RRNO, A.CUST_MBL_TELNO AS CUST_MBL_TELNO, A.CO_TELNO AS CO_TELNO, -- 확인 대상 필드 A.CUST_EML_ADDR AS CUST_EML_ADDR, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CODEMST WHERE CODE_CL = '140' AND CODE_NO = A.OCCP_TY_CD) AS OCCP_TY_CD_NM, A.CUST_ADDR AS CUST_ADDR, C.PIC_NM AS PIC_NM, C.DEPT_NM AS DEPT_NM, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CODEMST WHERE CODE_CL = '141' AND CODE_NO = C.JBPS_TY_CD) AS JBPS_TY_CD_NM, C.PIC_MBL_TELNO AS PIC_MBL_TELNO, D.TSK_DTL_CN AS TSK_DTL_CN, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY A.CUST_NM ORDER BY A.CUST_NM DESC) AS rownumber FROM TB_CUSTMST A LEFT JOIN TB_CUSTPICREL B ON A.CUST_MBL_TELNO = B.CUST_MBL_TELNO AND B.CURR_STCD = '0' LEFT JOIN TB_PICMST C ON B.PIC_MBL_TELNO = C.PIC_MBL_TELNO AND C.CURR_STCD = '0' LEFT JOIN TB_PICTASK D ON C.PIC_MBL_TELNO = D.PIC_MBL_TELNO WHERE A.CURR_STCD = '0' AND A.CUST_MBL_TELNO = #{cust_mbl_telno} ) A WHERE A.rownumber = 1;

/* system.cust_mng.getInitInfo */ select A.PIC_NM as PIC_NM ,A.DEPT_NM as DEPT_NM ,(SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CODEMST WHERE CODE_CL = '141' AND CODE_NO = A.JBPS_TY_CD) as JBPS_TY_CD_NM ,A.PIC_MBL_TELNO as PIC_MBL_TELNO ,A.PIC_EML_ADDR as PIC_EML_ADDR ,A.JNCMP_YMD as JNCMP_YMD ,A.ETC_TSK_CN as ETC_TSK_CN from TB_PICMST A where 1=1 and A.CURR_STCD = '0' and A.PIC_NM = #{pic_nm}

/* system.cust_mng.getPicSelInfo */ select A.PIC_NM as PIC_NM2 ,A.DEPT_NM as DEPT_NM ,(SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CODEMST WHERE CODE_CL = '141' AND CODE_NO = A.JBPS_TY_CD) as JBPS_TY_CD_NM ,A.PIC_MBL_TELNO as PIC_MBL_TELNO ,A.PIC_EML_ADDR as PIC_EML_ADDR ,A.JNCMP_YMD as JNCMP_YMD ,A.ETC_TSK_CN as ETC_TSK_CN from TB_PICMST A where 1=1 and A.CURR_STCD = '0' and A.PIC_NM = #{pic_nm}

/* system.cust_mng.getPicInfo */ SELECT A.PIC_NM AS PIC_NM, A.DEPT_NM AS DEPT_NM, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CODEMST WHERE CODE_CL = '141' AND CODE_NO = A.JBPS_TY_CD) AS JBPS_TY_CD_NM, A.PIC_MBL_TELNO AS PIC_MBL_TELNO, A.USER_ID AS USER_ID FROM TB_PICMST A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.CURR_STCD = '0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CUSTPICREL (CUST_MBL_TELNO, PIC_MBL_TELNO, REL_TY_CD, WRTER_NM, WRT_DT, CURR_STCD) VALUES (#{cust_mbl_telno}, #{pic_mbl_telno}, #{rel_ty_cd}, #{wrter_nm}, NOW(),#{curr_stcd})
mapper.update: /* system.cust_mng.updateStcdRoof */ UPDATE TB_CUSTPICREL SET CURR_STCD = '9' WHERE 1=1 AND CUST_MBL_TELNO = #{cust_mbl_telno}
mapper.select: /* system.cust_mng.getCustOne */ SELECT A.CUST_NM as CUST_NM2 ,A.WRT_DT as WRT_DT ,A.RRNO as RRNO ,A.CUST_EML_ADDR as CUST_EML_ADDR ,A.CO_TELNO as CO_TELNO ,A.CUST_MBL_TELNO as CUST_MBL_TELNO ,A.OCCP_TY_CD_NM as OCCP_TY_CD_NM ,A.CUST_ADDR as CUST_ADDR ,A.TSK_DTL_CN as TSK_DTL_CN ,A.OCCP_TY_CD as OCCP_TY_CD FROM (SELECT A.CUST_NM as CUST_NM ,A.RRNO as RRNO ,A.CUST_MBL_TELNO as CUST_MBL_TELNO ,A.CO_TELNO as CO_TELNO ,A.CUST_EML_ADDR as CUST_EML_ADDR ,(SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CODEMST WHERE CODE_CL = '140' AND CODE_NO = A.OCCP_TY_CD) as OCCP_TY_CD_NM ,A.CUST_ADDR as CUST_ADDR ,TO_CHAR(A.WRT_DT, 'YYYYDDMM') as WRT_DT ,D.TSK_DTL_CN as TSK_DTL_CN ,A.OCCP_TY_CD as OCCP_TY_CD ,row_number() over (PARTITION by A.CUST_NM order by A.CUST_NM desc) as rownumber FROM TB_CUSTMST A ,TB_CUSTPICREL B ,TB_PICMST C left outer join TB_PICTASK D on C.PIC_MBL_TELNO = D.PIC_MBL_TELNO WHERE 1=1 and A.CUST_MBL_TELNO = B.CUST_MBL_TELNO and B.PIC_MBL_TELNO = C.PIC_MBL_TELNO and A.CURR_STCD = '0' and B.CURR_STCD = '0' and C.CURR_STCD = '0' and A.CUST_NM = #{cust_nm} ) A WHERE rownumber = 1

/* system.cust_mng.getPicOne */ select C.PIC_NM as PIC_NM ,C.DEPT_NM as DEPT_NM ,(SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CODEMST WHERE CODE_CL = '141' AND CODE_NO = C.JBPS_TY_CD) as JBPS_TY_CD_NM ,C.PIC_MBL_TELNO as PIC_MBL_TELNO FROM TB_CUSTMST A ,TB_CUSTPICREL B ,TB_PICMST C WHERE 1=1 and A.CUST_MBL_TELNO = B.CUST_MBL_TELNO and B.PIC_MBL_TELNO = C.PIC_MBL_TELNO and A.CURR_STCD = '0' and B.CURR_STCD = '0' and C.CURR_STCD = '0' and A.CUST_MBL_TELNO = #{cust_mbl_telno}
